Key Match Events: Andrej Kramaric scored for Croatia in the 74th minute.
Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal for Albania in the 76th minute.
Qazim Laçi scored for Albania in the 11th minute.
Klaus Gjasula scored for Albania in the 90'+5' minute.
Mateo Kovacic's shot was saved in the 90'+8' minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Underdogs Albania snatch late draw with Croatia.
Lowly Albania held Croatia to a 2-2 draw in a thrilling Euro 2024 encounter on Wednesday that left both teams fighting it out for progression to the knockout stage.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Volksparkstadion in Hamburg, Germany.
Croatia had 67% possession while Albania had 33%.
Croatia had 10 shots on goal compared to Albania's 7.
Croatia had 22 shot attempts compared to Albania's 15.
Croatia had 3 corner kicks while Albania had 1.
Croatia made 5 saves while Albania made 8.
